title: How to Get the Cookie Dunker Achievement on Cookie Clicker

steps.headline: Get three other achievements.
steps.description:
To make this achievement unlockable, you'll need to unlock 3 other achievements. Achievements to easily unlock include:
What's in a name (name your bakery). Tiny cookie (click the tiny cookie to the right of "Baked cookies (all time):")
Here you go (click the achievement slot next to "What's in a name")
Wake and bake (bake 1 cookie in an ascension)
Casual baking (bake 1 cookie per second)
Click (buy 1 cursor)
Double-click (buy 2 cursors)
Golden cookie (click a Golden Cookie)
Clicktastic (make 1,000 cookies just by clicking)
Grandma's cookies (buy a grandma)
Just wrong (sell a grandma)
Tabloid addiction (click the news area between Options and Info 50 times)
My first farm (buy 1 farm)

steps.headline: Contract your browser window.
steps.description: This will make it possible to get this achievement, as you can now force the Big Cookie to go into the Milk.

steps.headline: Shrink the browser window until it looks like the Milk is touching the Big Cookie and hold it there for 1 second.
Finished.
steps.description: Enjoy the free achievement. This achievement also rewards upgraded milk!

text:
Open up Cookie Clicker.  Get three other achievements. To make this achievement unlockable, you'll need to unlock 3 other achievements. Achievements to easily unlock include:
What's in a name (name your bakery). Tiny cookie (click the tiny cookie to the right of "Baked cookies (all time):")
Here you go (click the achievement slot next to "What's in a name")
Wake and bake (bake 1 cookie in an ascension)
Casual baking (bake 1 cookie per second)
Click (buy 1 cursor)
Double-click (buy 2 cursors)
Golden cookie (click a Golden Cookie)
Clicktastic (make 1,000 cookies just by clicking)
Grandma's cookies (buy a grandma)
Just wrong (sell a grandma)
Tabloid addiction (click the news area between Options and Info 50 times)
My first farm (buy 1 farm) Contract your browser window. This will make it possible to get this achievement, as you can now force the Big Cookie to go into the Milk. Shrink the browser window until it looks like the Milk is touching the Big Cookie and hold it there for 1 second.  Maximize the window again.  Finished. Enjoy the free achievement. This achievement also rewards upgraded milk!
